name: WebGLRenderingContext.viewport
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.viewport() method of the WebGL API sets the viewport, which specifies the affine transformation of x and y from normalized device coordinates to window coordinates.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'viewport' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glViewport' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
